channel.title: Class Files in Notepad?
channel.description:
I am currently playing around with 508 servers and they require a lot of compiled files such as class files. I understand that this might be under the compile problem topic but I'm putting it out here anyway just incase it has nothing to do with it. Anyway I'm having a problem where I can't open any of the Class files - such as Login and Frame in the 508 servers. I'm not sure, I can open them in notepad but they will look like this...
[img]http://i267.photobucket.com/albums/ii305/Rsw_Hi/notepad.jpg[/img]
I'm not sure what I can do or what I'm doing wrong please help thanks,
Ryan

item.title: Class Files in Notepad?
item.dc:creator: @Emchie Emchie
item.description:
@Emchie wrote:

Download a Decompiler, the Decompile the Class Files and it should work fine. If not, ask somebody else that may be able to help you.

Read full topic
